price: Enti ntafowayifoͻ no de wͻn ho kͻͻ fͻm de wͻn anim butuu fͻm kaa sε. “Yɛagye Aaron ne Mose Wura Nyankopͻn no adi “.
arabic: فَأُلۡقِيَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ سُجَّدٗا قَالُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّ هَٰرُونَ وَمُوسَىٰ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fa-ul'qiya al-saḥaratu sujjadan qālū āmannā birabbi hārūna wamūsā
